required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Mechanical Massage Chair on Musculoskeletal Pain Improvement
clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Mechanical Massage Chair on Musculoskeletal Pain Improvement for Endoscopists and Endoscopy Nurses

brief_summary.textblock: The effect of mechanical massage chair on musculoskeletal pain improvement for endoscopists and endoscopy nurses

detailed_description.textblock:
Randomized, open-label, cross-over study
1. 1st phase Massage chair group (20 minutes/session, 3 sessions/week, 3 weeks), vs. control (no use of massage chair)
2. Wash-out period (9 weeks)
3. 2nd phase (cross-over) Massage chair group (20 minutes/session, 3 sessions/week, 3 weeks), vs. control (no use of massage chair)
- Msculoskeletal pain questionnaires (VAS, NDI, SPADI)
1) 1st phase: at baseline, 1.5 wk, 3 wk 2) 2nd phase: at baseline, 1.5 wk, 3 wk, 9wk after the end of treatment

study_design_info.masking_description: Randomization by allocation concealment Open label, cross-over design

primary_outcome.time_frame: The change of VAS value at baseline, 1.5 week, 3 weeks during treatment, and 9 weeks after treatment
primary_outcome.description: range: 0-10 (0: no pain; 10: worst possible pain)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: The change at baseline, 1.5 week, 3 weeks during treatment, and 9 weeks after treatment
secondary_outcome.description: range: 0-50 score (0: no pain or no disability, 50: worst pain or disability)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: The change at baseline, 1.5 week, 3 weeks during treatment, and 9 weeks after treatment
secondary_outcome.description: range: 0-100% (0: no pain or no disability, 100: worst pain or disability)

arm_group.description: Use mechanical massage chair for 20 minutes/1 session, 3 sessions/week, for 3 weeks
No use of mechanical massage chair for 3 weeks

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Endoscopists or endoscopic nurses working at Seoul National University Hospital Gangnam Center
Exclusion Criteria:
- Spine disease, skin disease, acute inflammation, electrical heart device, thromboembolism, fracture, osteoporosis, varicose vein
- Pregnancy

overall_official.affiliation: Seoul National University Hospital Gangnam Center

facility.name: Healthcare System Gangnam Center, Seoul National University Hospital
